sentences.english: It was written in the throes of second half of the Great Depression.
sentences.chinese: 這句名言是在大蕭條的苦況中誕生的。

sentences.english: The poverty in our cities is a damning indictment of modern society.
sentences.chinese: 我們的城市中的貧民苦況是現代社會的一大敗象。

sentences.english: But Xinhua acknowledged their grievances in an article last week.
sentences.chinese: 但是，上週在一篇文章中新華社承認其苦況。

sentences.english: He says more than a decade more nights without sleep, awake at night grievances.
sentences.chinese: 他更道出十多年來夜不安眠，寢食難安的苦況。
